description: 12 core behavioral questions — same for all 22 maritime roles

prompts.en: Give a specific example of explaining a complex or technical topic to someone who had difficulty understanding it. How did you adapt your communication?
prompts.tr: Zor veya teknik bir konuyu anlamakta güçlük çeken birine anlatman gereken somut bir örnek ver. İletişimini nasıl uyarladın?

rubric.high: Concrete maritime example, audience-adapted language, confirmation of understanding, positive outcome.
rubric.mid: Relevant example with some detail but missing audience adaptation or outcome.
rubric.low: Vague, generic, or no real example provided.

prompts.en: Describe a time you made a mistake on the job. How did you take ownership and what steps did you take to correct it?
prompts.tr: İşte bir hata yaptığın bir durumu anlat. Hatayı nasıl sahiplendin ve düzeltmek için hangi adımları attın?

rubric.high: Admits specific mistake, takes full ownership, describes corrective action and lesson learned.
rubric.mid: Acknowledges mistake but partial ownership or vague corrective steps.
rubric.low: Deflects blame, denies mistakes, or gives a non-answer.

prompts.en: Tell me about a conflict within your team and how you helped resolve it. What was the outcome?
prompts.tr: Ekip içinde yaşanan bir çatışmayı ve bunu çözmek için nasıl katkıda bulunduğunu anlat. Sonuç ne oldu?

rubric.high: Specific conflict scenario, mediating role, active listening, constructive resolution, lasting outcome.
rubric.mid: Describes conflict and some resolution effort but lacks specifics on approach or outcome.
rubric.low: Avoids conflict, blames others, or gives no example.

prompts.en: During a long or demanding watch/shift, how do you maintain standards and attention to detail? Give a real example.
prompts.tr: Uzun veya yoğun bir vardiyada standartları ve detaylara dikkatini nasıl korursun? Gerçek bir örnek ver.

rubric.high: Concrete routine/system for maintaining standards, checklist usage, fatigue management, real example.
rubric.mid: Mentions discipline but lacks specific system or example.
rubric.low: Generic answer with no practical method described.

prompts.en: Describe a time you noticed a hazard or near-miss situation. What did you do, and what was the result?
prompts.tr: Bir tehlike veya ramak kala durumu fark ettiğin bir anı anlat. Ne yaptın ve sonuç ne oldu?

rubric.high: Identifies specific hazard, takes immediate action, reports through proper channels, describes outcome/prevention.
rubric.mid: Notices hazard and takes some action but incomplete reporting or follow-up.
rubric.low: Ignores hazards, normalizes risk, or provides no example.

prompts.en: Give an example of a high-pressure situation where you stayed calm and made good decisions. What helped you?
prompts.tr: Baskı altında sakin kalıp doğru kararlar verdiğin bir durumu anlat. Sana ne yardımcı oldu?

rubric.high: Specific high-stakes scenario, describes internal coping mechanism, logical decision-making, positive outcome.
rubric.mid: Mentions pressure but lacks detail on coping strategy or decision process.
rubric.low: Claims never stressed, or gives unrealistic answer.

prompts.en: If a colleague or superior pushes you to take a shortcut that bypasses a safety procedure, how do you respond? Give a real example if possible.
prompts.tr: Bir meslektaşın veya amirin güvenlik prosedürünü atlatmanı isterse nasıl karşılık verirsin? Mümkünse gerçek bir örnek ver.

rubric.high: Firm refusal with diplomatic communication, cites specific regulation/procedure, escalation path, real example.
rubric.mid: Would refuse but uncertain about how to handle the interpersonal dynamics.
rubric.low: Would comply with shortcut, normalizes cutting corners.

prompts.en: Describe an unexpected equipment failure or operational problem. What was your approach to diagnosing and solving it?
prompts.tr: Beklenmedik bir ekipman arızası veya operasyonel sorunu anlat. Teşhis ve çözüm yaklaşımın nasıldı?

rubric.high: Systematic diagnosis (observe, isolate, test), resource use, communication with team, outcome.
rubric.mid: Some troubleshooting but lacks systematic approach.
rubric.low: Waited for someone else, or no relevant example.

prompts.en: What is something new you learned in the last 6 months related to your work? How did you learn it?
prompts.tr: Son 6 ayda işinle ilgili öğrendiğin yeni bir şey nedir? Nasıl öğrendin?

rubric.high: Specific skill/knowledge, active learning method (course, mentoring, self-study), applies to work.
rubric.mid: Mentions learning but vague on method or application.

prompts.en: Give an example of how you communicate with a superior and how you give or receive feedback. What makes it effective?
prompts.tr: Bir amirinle nasıl iletişim kurduğunu ve geri bildirim alıp verdiğini örnek vererek anlat. Bunu etkili kılan nedir?

rubric.high: Two-way communication example, respectful tone, specific feedback given/received, growth result.
rubric.mid: Describes communication but one-directional or lacking feedback specifics.
rubric.low: Avoids feedback, fears authority, or gives no example.

prompts.en: Describe an ethical dilemma you faced at work. What did you decide, and why?
prompts.tr: İşte karşılaştığın bir etik ikilemi anlat. Ne karar verdin ve neden?

rubric.high: Real dilemma with competing interests, principled decision, explains moral reasoning, outcome.
rubric.mid: Recognizes ethical tension but decision-making rationale unclear.
rubric.low: No ethical awareness, or chose the convenient over the right.

prompts.en: What keeps you motivated during a long contract? And what would make you leave a contract early?
prompts.tr: Uzun bir kontrat süresince seni motive eden nedir? Ve bir kontratı erken bırakmanıza ne sebep olur?

rubric.high: Clear intrinsic motivators (growth, purpose, team), honest about deal-breakers, self-aware.
rubric.mid: Mentions motivation but lacks depth or self-awareness.
rubric.low: Only money-driven, unrealistic expectations, or evasive.
